entries.meaning: A public or private establishment that is open late at night to provide entertainment, food, drink, music and/or dancing.

verbs.description: nightclub (third-person singular simple present nightclubs, present participle nightclubbing, simple past and past participle nightclubbed)

entries.meaning: To visit a nightclub (or nightclubs) for entertainment.
examples: Our first night in the big city we went out nightclubbing. The next morning we stayed in hung over.
